publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3714 Johann Lamont: Glasgow: European City of Sport 2003—That the Parliament congratulates Glasgow on receiving the title of European City of Sport 2003 and considers that this honour should be taken into account in the decision on the siting of the new national sports stadium.
S1M-3714 Glasgow: European City of Sport 2003 (lodged on 17 December 2002) Tommy Sheridan*

S1M-3714 Johann Lamont: Glasgow: European City of Sport 2003—That the Parliament congratulates Glasgow on receiving the title of European City of Sport 2003 and considers that this honour should be taken into account in the decision on the siting of the new national sports stadium.Supported by: Tommy Sheridan
S1M-3714 Glasgow: European City of Sport 2003 (lodged on 17 December 2002) Brian Fitzpatrick*
S1M-3714 Glasgow: European City of Sport 2003 (lodged on 17 December 2002) Trish Godman*
S1M-3714 Glasgow: European City of Sport 2003 (lodged on 17 December 2002) Cathy Peattie*
S1M-3714 Glasgow: European City of Sport 2003 (lodged on 17 December 2002) Bill Butler*
S1M-3714 Glasgow: European City of Sport 2003 (lodged on 17 December 2002) Elaine Smith*

S1M-3714 Johann Lamont: Glasgow: European City of Sport 2003—That the Parliament congratulates Glasgow on receiving the title of European City of Sport 2003 and considers that this honour should be taken into account in the decision on the siting of the new national sports stadium. Supported by: Tommy Sheridan, Brian Fitzpatrick, Trish Godman, Cathy Peattie, Bill Butler, Elaine Smith
